nuhker

Class ForeignCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • nuhker.ForeignCode

  • public class ForeignCode
extends java.lang.Object
    Foreign code is kept in this Class, that means the code whose authors are not precisely known. This is to mitigate the risk of eventual plagiarism.
    Author:
    various sources

    • Method Detail

      • downLoader

        public static byte[] downLoader(java.lang.String urlToDL)
        This is the web downloader of a specific purpose. NB! The code has been put into a separate subroutine because of it contains lines with SOMEBODY's copyright. However, because of no responsibility, it is nice to play with a truckload of try/catch blocks. Authors are unknown. The code represents an industry standard example represented in many textbooks. And ... some lines of the code are mine, is this too risky to claim?
        Parameters:
        urlToDL - download link at RIPE
        Returns:
        byteArray[] to further convert into a String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if socket transfer to/from the RIPE failed

      • calculateHash

        public static java.lang.String calculateHash(java.lang.String argument)
        Because the general warning by NSA is - never make crypto at home - I used this method to mark SOMEBODY'S ELSE COPYRIGHT on hash calculation routines. This method does some hashing with the string.
        Parameters:
        argument - Name of the Author to be checked cryptographically
        Returns:
        String hash digest
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - which is marked but not actually used
